issues_found: Food debris on floors and countertops
Lack of trash cans and recycling bins
recommendations: Implement a daily cleaning schedule for cooking surfaces and equipment
Sweep and mop floors regularly to prevent food debris accumulation
Establish a utensil and equipment sanitizing protocol
Provide adequate trash and recycling facilities
Cover food and ingredients when not in use to prevent contamination
good_practices: Separation of raw and cooked foods
Use of gloves by food handlers
report.overall_summary: While some good practices are observed, the cooking area requires significant improvement in terms of cleanliness and organization to ensure a safe and healthy food environment.
